remarks:
A mixed syllogism inference from a nested implication and a biconditional.  Useful for substituting an embedded consequent with a definition.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-1993.) 

---

 A mixed syllogism inference from a nested implication and a biconditional.  Useful for substituting an embedded consequent with a definition.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
syl6ibr.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
syl6ibr.2 $e |- ( th <-> ch ) $.
syl6ibr $p |- ( ph -> ( ps -> th ) ) $.
